answers.answer: No, as long as you don't over indulge and make sure you drink plenty of water you'll be fine so will your baby :)
I mean unless of course your Dr says differently.
Nope! I have a soda or two everyday!! I need the caffeine!! It makes me happy LOL.
A can or two here and there is fine. Just drink enough water.

I'm drnkn sodas daily too I try to avoid the ones wth caffeine,(34wks) but I personally feel tht wtever it is u wana eat go ahead an indulge, like my biggest prblm is coffee, I'm a ex smoker an for me to stay off the cigs I substitute wth coffee, I'm tryn the decaf, dnt punish urslf, an enjy bein pregnant

I drink atleast a glass or 2 a day also. Only reasoning behind not drinking soda is the baby can become addicted to the caffine, just like we do. The baby can suffer from withdraws when he/she arrives. Plus you need to make sure you're taking in lots of water so you dtay hydrated and you have plenty of amniotic fluid.

Soda is okay in moderation. My doc recommended to keep caffeine to a minimum of 200mg daily and watch the sugar intake (some sodas may contain no caffeine but be high in sugar) because you do not want to develop gestational diabetes. Congratulations on the pregnancy!

question: Omg I had my first Dr.Pepper yesterday since I found i'm pregnant. Are Big Red zeros bad? I'm 12 Weeks can it hurt my baby?
title: Sodas!
